page.title: 10Our Clubs, Sheerness
page.content: There are many different clubs on Sheppey. Our 1st and 2nd years wrote about the clubs they go to. The most popular{recreation}is {horse riding}with 4 schools to choose from. There are 16{clubs}which only 1 or 2 girls in the 1st or 2nd year go to such as St.John's Ambulance Brigade; Karate;Judo;Squash;Piano;Computers; Orienteering;Swimming and Pool. The second most popular club is {Majorettes}and a new group has just started.One of the main things the girls enjoy are the competitions. Brownies and Guides are quite popular and there are quite a lot of groups on Sheppey. A few girls go to the Leisure Centre and use the facilities there particularly for roller skating and some go to various dancing clubs.
